body: When i see niggas on the comment section complaining about how an NTR ain't NTR enough for them, i always know this one's made for me, cuz this kind of shit is what i live for

well, pimping your wife is stupid, but stupid is rampant in the real world so why not. pimping your slut stepmother, whatever, she'd do it herself otherwise anyway. pimping your customer's wife, now that's a spin you just can't see seriously at all. the lucky coincidences leading to pimping her to her own husband actually make it ok. still unsure if the draw was rigged or it was just bad writing... even coaxing that customer's wife in a 3some with you seems fair considering you pimped your own wife to him too first. but eventually some other customer not in on the joke might use their points on her, what then?
Hoestly, the NTR perspective her is very bad, heck, like there is no consequences since the wife is too loyal, therefore, it's not true NTR.
I rarely read a hentai manga from beginning to end of the volume, but since this is NTR-ly good (nice pun), i didn't even skip one page lol.
Nah this is what I called A TRASH
